decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B1, B24, H8, Replacement UDP Policies 4.1, 4.8, 5.9. | Notwithstanding the drawings herein approved, the width of the sash bar shall be constructed at 22mm, not 26mm as shown on the submitted plans.  REASON:  To protect and enhance the appearance of the Brentham Garden Estate Conservation Area, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policy B24, Replacement UDP Policy 4.8.
description: Dormer window to rear roof slope
